item.title: Philosophy | Φιλοσοφία | Philosophy
item.description: Leave everything at least no worse than it was before you. Values Following the teaching of Christ (faith in God) — not in form, but in essence Courage and bravery Mutually beneficial approaches My goal is to find and realize "points of sustainable balance in systems." Mutually beneficial solutions ensure long-term stability, avoiding imbalances. Practical applicability I prefer solutions that work in practice, but I also value beautiful theory. Meaningful Involvement I strive to live consciously, creating and strengthening "
